title: Already Redeemed
body:
I got a code from Amazon for $25 and I put in league and says its already redeemed...So what am I suppose to do?

I can provide anything needed for proof that I havent redeemed but I would love to have my $25 worth of riot points.

Also I got the code from Riot Games so it wasnt some sneaky provider it was from you guys

replies.body: That's really strange if a new code you received gave that error.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team will look at your issue individually.  Since it pertains to sensitive account details, the boards wouldn't be the best place to check things out.  We'll reply back to your ticket asap!
